attributes.action: Social Network Sites –Force Facebook to Crackdown on Racism/Fascism/Bullying/Religious Hatred
attributes.additional_details:
Facebook to ensure users follow rules & stop abusing others.
Facebook have a reporting functionality however not good, thousands of pages are set up breaking all rules > No actions being taken by Facebook
we ran petition to stop the Burka Ban come in to the UK and now we want to take action on something which affects not just the Muslims but everyone.
We want the government to Force Facebook to comply with our demands below in order to operate in the UK:

•	Reporting made easier & must be monitored to ensure when things are reported action must be taken quickly and a set number of people who must report something before action to be taken.
•	Creating of Profiles must be stricter as there are thousands of fake profiles which are going around abusing everyone!
•	MUST remove when reported no matter who or what they are targeting in their abuse!

ensure this happens and Facebook sign up to it to make the internet a safer place for everyone

Join Fight4Rights
